channel.title: Comments on: Blame It On H.R.

item.title: By: Nanette D. Massey
item.dc:creator: Nanette D. Massey
item.description: Thanks Hella. I'm trying to make this site all about being a practical source.
item.content:encoded: Thanks Hella. I’m trying to make this site all about being a practical source.

item.title: By: Hella (@Hella_Jacob)
item.dc:creator: Hella (@Hella_Jacob)
item.description: Thank you, Nanette! Sometimes it can be hard to think of what to say in the moment, so it's smart to have a phrase that one can use in any number of circumstances, rather than be that person who remains silent only to later say to their friend: "Can you believe they said that?!"
item.content:encoded: Thank you, Nanette! Sometimes it can be hard to think of what to say in the moment, so it’s smart to have a phrase that one can use in any number of circumstances, rather than be that person who remains silent only to later say to their friend: “Can you believe they said that?!”
